name: Clever Cake Mix Crinkle Cookies
author: thehungryscientist
summary: This simplifies these cookies to a formula that works with just about any cake mix of a certain weight. (If you don't love to measure, this 4-ingredient recipe is your ticket to cookie bliss.) You can find 3 variations below. Cookies can be stored in an airtight container up to 3 days or frozen up to 3 months.
directions: Position a rack in center of the oven and preheat to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Stir cake mix, eggs, and butter together in a large bowl
Shape dough into 1-inch balls; roll in powdered sugar to coat
Set balls about 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets
Bake 1 pan at a time, in the preheated oven, just until edges are firm and cracks appear slightly moist, 9 to 11 minutes
Cool on pans for 3 minutes; transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
